data.eml:eml: New spider species of Coelotinae (Araneae, Amaurobiidae) from northern Thailand IV

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dankittipakul, Pakawin, Wang, Xin-Ping (2008): New spider species of Coelotinae (Araneae, Amaurobiidae) from northern Thailand IV. Zootaxa 1695: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180707
